'''Embracer Group''' is the parent company of businesses developing and publishing games. With its head office based in Karlstad, Sweden, Embracer Group has a global presence through its ten operative groups: THQ Nordic, Plaion, Coffee Stain, Amplifier Game Invest, Saber Interactive, DECA Games, Gearbox Entertainment, Easybrain, Asmodee (the owner of [[Fantasy Flight Games]]<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://www.fantasyflightgames.com/en/news/2014/11/17/fantasy-flight-games-to-merge-into-the-asmodee-group-tm/|articlename=FANTASY FLIGHT GAMES® TO MERGE INTO ASMODEE GROUP™|dated=17 November 2014|website=|accessed=31 August 2022}}</ref>), and Dark Horse. The Group has 120 internal game development studios and is engaging more than 12,750 employees and contracted employees in more than 40 countries.<ref name="embracertolkien" /> 

In [[2022]] the company acquired [[Middle-earth Enterprises]] which included the licensing rights to ''[[The Hobbit]]'' and ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' .<ref name="embracertolkien">{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://embracer.com/release/embracer-group-enters-into-agreement-to-acquire-ip-rights-to-the-lord-of-the-rings-and-the-hobbit-literary-works-by-j-r-r-tolkien/|articlename=EMBRACER GROUP ENTERS INTO AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE IP RIGHTS TO THE LORD OF THE RINGS AND THE HOBBIT LITERARY WORKS BY J.R.R TOLKIEN|dated=18 August 2022|website=https://embracer.com|accessed=18 August 2022}}</ref>
